content: HTML sometimes needs tweaking, depending on how it's written. My suggestion is to try the signature on both platforms to see how they look. Then, there may be a need to adjust to fit. That is, no one can say offhand that an HTML sig will work.

Hi there x4tz2bjyrb

Can you send us a screenshot of these Smtp settings of yours if these are not okay? Is your SMTP setting OK? ðŸŽ…

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/how-to-make-screenshots

What kind of antivirus do you have installed on that PC or laptop? May I ask? is it McAfee? How much accounts do you have exactly?

Try sending the recipient with other email providers to see if it's really an error related to Thunderbird. Mostly not.try to send other sort of files with no links attached in data files or more little ones at a time. Okay , you did not send these data at all , okay.

Removing that file that you should had sanded to others if it had worked normally. Can you remove that file temporarily and restart thunderbird with the same settings? Send a little file to other recipients then , to other people/recipients or a test email to your self. I think this is normally possible to do ? Am i right?

content:
Hello there x4tz2bjyrb

After reviewing this issue.

It seems to be about that server sided issue here. Vpn services could be wrong and detect you as wrong. Sending that file as a draft could create errors. Did this error appeared more frequently lately. Some users did report that these symptoms did vanished after multiple days of waiting.

To solve or resolve this issue is to check the data that had to be send and remove spammy language s and not valid or suspicious links to. Or use that text that i written above in the first reply. Can you understand this?

content:
Da quel che scrivi potresti esserti imbattuto in un bug molto grave. Tuttavia non posso confermarlo perchÃ© al momento la tua Ã¨ la sola segnalazione di questo tipo di cui sono a conoscenza.

Se hai un backup, penso si possa ripristinare tutto alla situazione precedente.

Se non hai un backup invece non so fino a che punto si possa rimediare. Nel caso comunque:

  1. fai un backup della situazione attuale ->
  2. scarica le versione 145 https://archive.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/releases/145.0/
  3. e installala sopra la versione 146
  4. disattiva l'aggiornamento automatico nelle impostazioni

Se usi Thunderbird per scopri lavorativi o se comunque hai bisogno di maggiore stabilitÃ  considera di passare a Thunderbird ESR -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/versione-esr-thunderbird
